Author: Shreddedlikechedda
Text: It’s just indigestible finer, it’s still technically a carb but it’s just like when sugar alcohol calories are listed as carbs—your body can’t derive any energy from it. Don’t worry :)

Author: mavienoire
Text: 1 carb is only 4 calories. I wouldn’t worry about 4 calories. It is literally impossible to see any weight change from eating 4 extra calories. That’s the equivalent of drinking like 1/2 cup of vegetable broth. And maybe, that 1 carb really does make them more palatable (and less like eating rubber bands, lol).
